#summary A set of functions for CameraControlSystem orbital camera.

=== Overview ===
An orbital camera is an attached camera where the user can modify the camera position. If the scene focus is seen as the center of a sphere, the camera rotates around it.
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetOrbitalCameraRotationFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double degrees_per_second) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !SetOrbitalCameraZoomFactor(double camera_mode_ptr, double units_per_second) ===
----
====Parameters====
   * _camera_id_ - The ID of the camera control system camera object.
